Resolved Question Show me another » Red Robin--a sit-down restaurant or fast food restaurant? Is Red Robin a place where you go in and order at the counter and pick up your food at the counter, then take it to your seat, or are you seated by the hostess and have a waiter/waitress to take your order and bring your food? 5 years ago Report Abuse by AlloAllo Member since: July 07, 2006 Total points: 3,243 (Level 4) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker You are seated and they have wait-staff. It's a"gourmet"hamburger place! They do have good burgers. The best thing about them is the bottomless fries. You can keep asking and asking and they will bring you baskets of crisp, golden, yummy steak fries.
Oh, yeah...they have a bar, too. You could, of course, always get carry-out if you didn't want to eat in.
Thanks...now I might have to go there tonight for dinner! 5 years ago Report Abuse
